pkmkdoc.description:
This installer copies the files used by Front Row (10.6) into their respective locations on your computer.
NOTE: There is no support from Apple when trying to use Front Row in 10.7+. Any and all issues that arise from installing this software are at your own risk!

choice.title: Front Row Launcher (Application)
choice.description: This is the applet that launches the Front Row app found in /System/Library/CoreServices. The applet contains an AppleScript script that inputs the key code 53 for the ESC key (to activate Front Row). This is optional if you'd like to design your own method of launching the CoreService.

choice.title: Front Row (CoreServices)
choice.tooltip: This is the actual Front Row application.
choice.description: This is the Front Row application. Double-clicking the application merely runs the process (which, for a short duration, allows you to type the ESC key to activate the Front Row interface). Paired with an applet that automatically inputs the key code 53 (ESC key) to start the Front Row interface.

requirement.message: This package will only install to Mac OS X v 10.6 or newer.
50MB of free space is required for this installation.
